result.eng: Would you like to write an article?
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat alt a scríobh
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat alt a scríobh
result.html: Ar mhaith leat alt a scríobhWould you like to write an article?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat alt a scríoḃWould you like to write an article?

result.ga: Chuir mé mo ghualainn as alt
result.orig: Chuir mé mo ghualainn as alt
result.html: Chuir mé mo ghualainn as altI dislocated my shoulder.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir mé mo ġualainn as altI dislocated my shoulder.

result.eng: It's a good detective story if the murder happens in the first paragraph.
result.ga: Is maith an scéal bleachtaireachta é ina dtarlaíonn an dúnmharú sa chéad alt
result.orig: Is maith an scéal bleachtaireachta é ina dtarlaíonn an dúnmharú sa chéad alt
result.html: Is maith an scéal bleachtaireachta é ina dtarlaíonn an dúnmharú sa chéad altIt's a good detective story if the murder happens in the first paragraph.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ an scéal bleaċtaireaċta é ina dtarlaíonn an dúnṁarú sa ċéad altIt's a good detective story if the murder happens in the first paragraph.

result.eng: Number of words in the article.
result.html: Líon na bhfocal san altNumber of words in the article.
result.ponchtml: Líon na ḃfocal san altNumber of words in the article.

result.eng: The article comes with a glossary.
result.ga: Tá gluais ag gabháil leis an alt
result.orig: Tá gluais ag gabháil leis an alt
result.html: Tá gluais ag gabháil leis an altThe article comes with a glossary.
result.ponchtml: Tá gluais ag gaḃáil leis an altThe article comes with a glossary.

result.ga: Tá rud éigin as alt anseo
result.orig: Tá rud éigin as alt anseo

result.ponchtml: Tá rud éigin as alt anseoSomething's not right here.

result.eng: An allowance will be awarded by virtue of Article 279.
